backend/main.mo: Main actor for the WorldConnect Income app, defining user profiles, loan/member referrals, withdrawal requests, OTP-based phone login, and level reward logic using stable Maps and mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state by adding two new fields — `phoneToPrincipal` and `otpRecords` maps — while preserving all existing state from the old actor shape.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming high-confidence implementation of the member mobile OTP login feature, referencing the affected files `useQueries.ts` and `LoginPage.tsx` and test ID REQ-46.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a build/documentation reference for the project's React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, charts, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'WorldConnect Income', mounting the app at `#root` and loading `src/main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all app routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and a ProfileSetupModal triggered when an authenticated user has no saved profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their full name and phone number to complete account setup, submitting via an async `onComplete` callback.
frontend/src/components/banking/LoanBank: Renders a grid of banking/loan service cards (KYC Loan, Salary Loan, Business Loan, Zero Balance Account, Credit Card) with icons, descriptions, badges, and an 'Apply Now' button for each.
frontend/src/components/common/AmountDis: A reusable component that formats and displays an INR currency amount with configurable size, optional sign prefix, and color coding for negative vs. positive values.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusBad: Displays a colored badge for a withdrawal status (pending, approved, or rejected), with a tooltip showing the rejection reason for rejected statuses.
frontend/src/components/deposit/DepositI: Renders a numbered step-by-step instruction card explaining how to make a UPI deposit and submit the transaction ID.
frontend/src/components/deposit/UPIPayme: Displays a UPI payment QR code image along with the payee name and UPI ID for making deposits.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Provides the admin panel shell with a fixed red sidebar containing navigation links (Dashboard, Requests, Users, Settings), a logout button, and a main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Provides the main user-facing layout with a sticky header, a hamburger-triggered mobile menu, and a fixed bottom navigation bar for the core app routes.
frontend/src/components/levels/LevelProg: Shows the user's current MLM level, team size, a progress bar toward the next level, and reward amounts for the current and next levels.
frontend/src/components/levels/LevelStru: Renders a table of all MLM levels with their required team size, reward amount, and a status badge (Active, Achieved, or Locked) based on the user's current level.
frontend/src/components/referrals/Referr: React component that displays a user's referral link (built from their principal ID) with a copy-to-clipboard button and visual feedback.
frontend/src/constants/levelStructure.ts: Defines a 10-level MLM-style structure with team size thresholds and rewards, plus helper functions to retrieve config for a given level or the next level.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, registration, deposits, withdrawals, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Poppins fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that displays summary statistics (pending, approved, rejected withdrawal counts and total amount) and a referral link generator for the admin.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRequestsPage.tsx: Admin page for viewing and managing all withdrawal requests, with approve and reject (with reason dialog) actions using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettingsPage.tsx: Placeholder admin page for system settings configuration, currently showing a 'coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersPage.tsx: Placeholder admin page for user management, currently showing a 'coming soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard displaying profile info, balance, team size, total earnings, level income, and navigation to key actions like deposit and withdrawal.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Deposit page allowing users to submit a deposit by entering an amount and UPI transaction ID, with a QR code and instructions for payment.
frontend/src/pages/LevelsPage.tsx: Page showing the user's level income summary, current level, team size, level progress card, and a level structure table.
frontend/src/pages/LoanReferralsPage.tsx: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with tabs for member (phone + OTP flow) and admin (phone-based) login, using Internet Identity and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/MemberReferralsPage.t: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: React page for new user registration that handles Internet Identity login, collects name/phone/referrer inputs, charges a ₹100 fee, and navigates to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistoryPag: React page that fetches and displays the caller's withdrawal requests in a styled table with amount, bank details, date, and status columns.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalPage.tsx: React page allowing users to submit a withdrawal request, enforcing a 1%-of-balance limit and requiring bank details before calling the withdrawal mutation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL/hash query parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a red color palette, custom box shadows, Inter/Poppins fonts, CSS-variable-based semantic colors, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 35) describing the WorldConnect Income MLM app's architecture, implemented features, and requirements including multi-level income, registration, deposits, withdrawals, and admin panel.
